text: "Stuck with U" is a song by American singer Ariana Grande and Canadian singer Justin Bieber. It was released as a single on May 8, 2020. The song appeared on Billboard Hot 100 when it was released, becoming Grande's third and Bieber's sixth U.S. number-one single. The song also debuted at number one on the Rolling Stone Top 100, chart issue dated May 21, 2020, becoming Grande's second and Bieber's first number-one single. The music video for the song had many celebrities appearing in it from their homes, including Kendall and Kylie Jenner, Demi Lovato, 2 Chainz, Paula Abdul, Stephen and Ayesha Curry, Elizabeth Gillies, Gwyneth Paltrow, Eric Stonestreet, Chance the Rapper, Kate Hudson, Lil Dicky, GaTa, Sheel Mohnot, Michael Bubl√©, Jaden Smith, Ashton Kutcher and Mila Kunis, as well as Bieber with his wife Hailey Bieber and Grande and her then-partner Dalton Gomez. As of August 2021, the song has raised over $3.5 million for the First Responders Children's Foundation, going directly to thousands of first responders' families around the U.S. ==References== Category:2020 songs Category:Ariana Grande songs Category:Justin Bieber songs
title: Stuck with U
